parameters.name: BackupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the backup set.

> You can call the [DescribeDataBackups](~~210093~~) operation to query the IDs of all backup sets of the instance. Only snapshot backup sets are supported.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the new instance.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~196830~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: SrcDbInstanceName
parameters.description:
The ID of the source instance.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.
